tool.name: SAGA.shapes_grid.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPES False isArrayGRIDS True output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.shapes_grid.0 SHAPES $SHAPES GRIDS $GRIDS RESAMPLING $RESAMPLING prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: GRIDS
param.label: Grids
param.help: Grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi, png

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Spatial Join: Retrieves information from the selected grids at the positions of the points of the selected points layer and adds it to the resulting layer.
